name: Neon Runner (cjwhite64)
description: Neon Runner is a 3D parkour platformer collectathon where the main gameplay mechanic is wall running. You can wall run by  holding forward and towards the wall you want to run on at the same time. Wall running script is from the youtuber Dave/Game Development that I've edited. Collect all 50 Neon Cells to win and enjoy! The version of Unity this is running off of is 2020.1.4f1
